# Intro

## Textbook 

As of Fall 2018, this class uses the book *Mathematical Statistics* by Jun Shao (2nd. edition). Unless otherwise noted, all definitions, lemmas, proposition, theorems, etc. can be found there. Numbering might not match.

## Conventions re: $\infty$

We will use the following conventions:

* $\infty + x = \infty, x \in \R$
* $x\cdot \infty = \infty$ if $x > 0$ 
* $x\cdot \infty = -\infty$ if $x < 0$
* $0\cdot \infty = 0$ 
* $\infty + \infty = \infty$
* $\infty^a = \infty, \forall a > 0$
* $\infty - \infty$ and $\frac{\infty}{\infty}$ are not defined
